template_info.name: Fire-Type Specialists
template_info.description: A blazing team of fire-type Pokemon with explosive offensive power and sun synergy
template_info.usage_notes: This mono-fire team focuses on overwhelming power and speed. Use Sunny Day to boost fire moves and enable powerful combos.

pokemon.name: charizard
pokemon.strategy: Solar Beam user under sun with devastating fire power
pokemon.tips: Set up Sunny Day early to power up fire moves and enable instant Solar Beam

pokemon.name: arcanine
pokemon.strategy: Fast physical fire attacker with priority and sun support
pokemon.tips: Extreme Speed gives priority to finish weakened enemies

pokemon.name: rapidash
pokemon.strategy: High-speed attacker with unique coverage moves
pokemon.tips: Megahorn handles pesky psychic types that resist fire moves

pokemon.name: magmar
pokemon.strategy: Bulky special attacker with diverse coverage
pokemon.tips: Use Confuse Ray to disrupt opponents before landing powerful attacks

pokemon.name: flareon
pokemon.strategy: Specially defensive fire type with recovery
pokemon.tips: Can take special hits well while dealing respectable damage back

pokemon.name: ninetales
pokemon.strategy: Status support specialist with burn infliction
pokemon.tips: Will-O-Wisp cripples physical attackers - your team's main weakness
